game.name: LOOP THE LOOP The Mansion of Gluttony
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A closed-circle mystery visual novel where twelve people are trapped in a secluded mansion and a string of murders begins. Read from Remi’s point of view as you slowly piece together the truth through his thoughts and conversations. Linear, text-focused, Japanese/English supported.
